short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This keeps clicking Mini Statement every 3 minutes; keeping the session open

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1) Prevents logout and keeps refreshing every 3 minutes when logged in
2) Saves login, password and mobile of your Federal Bank 

No information is transferred out of your computer. This extension has been reviewed by Google Chrome Webstore team
